thread.title: Benjamin D Goodman
thread.title_full: Firebird Tours reviewed by Benjamin D Goodman

author: Benjamin D Goodman
title: Benjamin D Goodman
text: My wife and I just returned from a 10 day tour of Italy. We arranged the time off and started to look for a guided tour of Venice, Rome and Amalfi Coast. We contacted Firebird Tours and they put a wonderful tour together in just a few days. Firebird Tours arranged hotel reservations and guided tours to these cities plus transport across Italy. We could not have asked for a better experience . The guides, drivers, and hotels were first rate and there were no loose ends. I would readilly recommend this company to anyone. Thanks Sim at Firebird Tours.
